channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Judge’s Order Complicates Justice Dept. Plans to Again Charge Comey
item.description: Justice Department officials have been considering whether to bring new charges against James B. Comey, the former F.B.I. director, after a different ...

item.title: After False Earthquake Alert in Nevada, Lawmakers Demand Answers on How it Was Sent
item.description: The federal government and earthquake experts blamed a technical glitch for the alert that sent warnings hundreds of miles away last week.

item.title: Dozens Killed as a Hospital Is Bombed in Myanmar’s Brutal Civil War
item.description: Jets from the Myanmar military dropped two bombs on the facility in Mrauk-U, in what rebels and witnesses called a deliberate attack on civilians.

item.title: In a Hamlet Built on Forbidden Love, a Cyclone Buried It All
item.description: Three generations of a family built their homes and lives in Sri Lanka’s highland tea country. The biggest storm in decades wiped out their hamlet in ...

item.title: Russia Sues Holder of Frozen Assets Europe Wants for Ukraine Loan
item.description: The lawsuit was a warning to European officials who are racing to agree to a plan to use Russian government assets in Europe to lend money to Ukraine.

item.title: In photos: Flooding in Western Washington state forces thousands to evacuate
item.description: Record flooding in Washington state has forced tens of thousands of people to evacuate after torrential rains this week.
